snippet: Before he led the investigation into Penn State’s role in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case, Louis J. Freeh, the former F.B.I. director, was involved in many high-profile cases.
abstract: Penn State inquiry adds to Louis J Freeh’s extensive resume; in his eight years as director of the FBI, Freeh was involved in many high-profile cases, including the 1996 Unabomer case.
lead_paragraph: Before he led the investigation into Penn State’s role in the Jerry Sandusky sexual abuse case, Louis J. Freeh, the former F.B.I. director, was involved in many high-profile cases.

headline.seo: Penn State Inquiry Adds to Louis J. Freeh’s Extensive Résumé
headline.main: Penn State Investigation Adds to Freeh’s Extensive Résumé
headline.print_headline: Penn State Investigation Adds To Freeh’s Extensive Résumé
